snippet.title: Sonic and the Fallen Star - Full Game Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the game and soundtrack here!: https://stardropsmh.github.io/sonic-and-the-fallen-star/
Follow the Twitter: https://twitter.com/SATFSDev

The song used is the track for Sapphire Sights Act 2 composed by Hollie Taylor, which you can listen to here: https://youtu.be/xnGjdmz1wNU

Special thanks to UsagiDood for editing this trailer together and doing the 3D animation, he made this release so much cooler with his contribution! Check him out here: https://twitter.com/UsagiDood
With some editing help from Fin : https://twitter.com/Findominator1
Also some huge thanks to DocMelonhead for the models used in the 3D animation, models you can check out here: https://www.models-resource.com/submitter/Doc+Melonhead/

Sonic and the Fallen Star is a fan game I've worked on for the past year and a half-ish. It's a project that I started with the goal to learn the process of game development, and while I still have quite a lot to learn, I think working on this has definitely taught me a thing or two.

It includes 9 zones, 2 playable characters, in-game cutscenes, and a fully original soundtrack by Hollie Taylor.

I also just wanted to say thanks to all the people that helped me along the way, from friends to fellow fan game creators, I really appreciate all the support I got.
